sect1.title: Release: 1.71.0
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.70.1 release.

sect2.title: Common
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the common code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Further tinkering with sidebar handling. Think I got it right this time. (re)closes bug 1541793. Thanks to Mauritz Jeanson.M: /trunk/xsl/common/titles.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

To make DocBook4-valid (the build ends up validing output of this using xjparse), replaced author/orgname with corpauthor and replaced all instances of tag with sgmltag.M: /trunk/xsl/common/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Added reference.autolabel parameter for controlling labels on reference output.M: /trunk/xsl/common/labels.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Did some touch-ups to a few files to ensure that building from PDF and text from reference.dbk will work.M: /trunk/xsl/common/refentry.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/common/common.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Support rows that are *completely* overlapped by the preceding rowM: /trunk/xsl/common/table.xsl - Norman Walsh
New modules for supporting indexing extensions.A: /trunk/xsl/common/autoidx-kimber.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/common/autoidx-kosek.xsl - Robert Stayton

Merged ref.css into reference.css, deleted ref.css, and updated stylesheet to use reference.css instead of ref.css. Also changed individual reference pages to use graphical admonitions.M: /trunk/xsl/common/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Added IDs in a number of places that should have time.M: /trunk/xsl/common/refentry.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/common/common.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added normalization to object.title.markup.textonly mode, reverted copyright link template in html/chunk-common.xsl to use it, and updated a couple of places in manpages that should have already been using it instead of object.title.markup.M: /trunk/xsl/common/gentext.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Fix attribute nameM: /trunk/xsl/common/common.xsl - Norman Walsh
fixed bug #1528002 olinks not handling dbhtml dirM: /trunk/xsl/common/olink.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/common/targets.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1539010, fix xml.base.dirs template to stop recursing if hit an absolute uri.M: /trunk/xsl/common/common.xsl - Robert Stayton

Corrected XPath expression used for finding date data within *info content -- such that dbtimestamp PIs are now correctly processed when they occur within refentry *info content.M: /trunk/xsl/common/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Removed svn:executable property from many xml and xsl files on which it had been inadvertently (CVS legacy).M: /trunk/xsl/common/autoidx-ng.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Support startinglinenumber on orderedlistM: /trunk/xsl/common/common.xsl - Norman Walsh
fixed lang entity to remove en appendageM: /trunk/xsl/common/autoidx-ng.xsl - Robert Stayton

sect2.title: Extensions
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the extensions code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Completely reworked extensions build system; now uses NetBeans and antD: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan27/.cvsignore; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/nbproject; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/nbproject/project.properties; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/prj.el; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/src; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/src/com; M: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/src/com/nwalsh/xalan/Text.java; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/nbproject/project.xml; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/build.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/build.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/nbproject/genfiles.properties; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/com; M: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/src/com/nwalsh/xalan/Func.java; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/test; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/src/com; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/nbproject/build-impl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/nbproject; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/src; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/nbproject/project.properties; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/.cvsignore; M: /trunk/xsl/extensions/Makefile; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon8; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/nbproject/genfiles.properties; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/nbproject/project.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/test; M: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/src/com/nwalsh/xalan/Verbatim.java; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2/build.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/extensions/xalan2; D: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon643; A: /trunk/xsl/extensions/saxon65/nbproject/build-impl.xml - Norman Walsh

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Fixed path selection in tgroup template.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Robert Stayton
Change tgroup position test to count preceding-sibling instead.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Robert Stayton
Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildM: /trunk/xsl/fo/Makefile - Michael(tm) Smith
Citations to nonexistent biblioentries do not issue warning.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/inline.xsl - Jirka Kosek
More carefully select language substring for sorting.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx-kimber.xsl - Robert Stayton
Re-enabled build of PDF version of ref docs.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith
xsl:sort lang attribute now uses two-char substring of lang attribute.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx-kimber.xsl - Robert Stayton

Support titlecase "Java", "Perl", and "IDL" as values for the language attribute on classsynopsis, etc. (instead of just lowercase "java", "perl", and "idl"). Also support "c++" and "C++" (instead of just "cpp").
Affects HTML, FO, and manpages output. Closes bug 1552332. Thanks to "Brian A. Vanderburg II".M: /trunk/xsl/fo/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Fixed index.term.separator on secondary and tertiary entries.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
Added support for the reference.autolabel param in (X)HTML and FO output.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith
Did some touch-ups to a few files to ensure that building from PDF and text from reference.dbk will work.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Support rows that are *completely* overlapped by the preceding rowM: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Norman Walsh
Add exclude-result-prefix="mml" so xmlns output only if mml: is actually used.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/math.xsl - Robert Stayton
Rearranged templates for the 3 indexing methods and changed method named 'english' to 'basic'.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
New modules for supporting indexing extensions.A: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx-kimber.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx-kosek.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1542773 section title in info not working, for db5 too.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/sections.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1542773 section title in info not formatting correctly.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/sections.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug 1545377 xml:id not supported in glossary.xsl.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/glossary.xsl - Robert Stayton
Added IDs in a number of places that should have time.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Prevent "titleabbrev in article: no template matches" warnings. Patch from Camille BÃ©gnis. Closes bug #1509100.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/component.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Turn off blank-body for fop1.extensions too since fop 0.92 does not support it either.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/pagesetup.xsl - Robert Stayton
Finish fixing bug #1540539M: /trunk/xsl/fo/sections.xsl - Norman Walsh
Fix bug #1540539M: /trunk/xsl/fo/sections.xsl - Norman Walsh
Fixed bug #1537751 sidebar content not being included.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/block.xsl - Robert Stayton
Add Xalan variant to test for exslt:node-set function. Xalan can use function named node-set(), but doesn't recognize it using function-available().M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
Add curly braces around ⟨ in xsl:sort lang attribute to make it an AVT.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton

Added support to FO stylesheets for handling instances of Org where it occurs outside of *info content. In HTML stylesheets, moved handling of Org out of info.xsl and into inline.xsl. In both FO and HTML stylesheets, added support for correctly processing Affiliation and Jobtitle.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/inline.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Don't output punctuation between Refname and Refpurpose if Refpurpose is empty. Also corrected handling of Refsect2/title instances, and removed some debugging stuff that was generated in manpages output to mark the ends of sections.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added new email.delimiters.enabled param. If non-zero (the default), delimiters are generated around e-mail addresses (output of the email element). If zero, the delimiters are suppressed.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/inline.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith
Fixed handling of punctuation for methodparam in methodsynopsis. Closes bug 1530558. Thanks to Evan Goer and Michael Fuchs.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Removed svn:executable property from many xml and xsl files on which it had been inadvertently (CVS legacy).M: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx-ng.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/fop1.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
fixed lang entity to remove en appendageM: /trunk/xsl/fo/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
fixed bug 1516275 set table width to 100% when proportional columns are usedM: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Robert Stayton
fixed bug 1497436 confirm @cols is a numberM: /trunk/xsl/fo/table.xsl - Robert Stayton
Initial support of syntax highlighting of programlistings.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.ent; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/param.xweb; A: /trunk/xsl/fo/highlight.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/fo/verbatim.xsl - Jirka Kosek
Chapter after preface should restart numbering of pages.M: /trunk/xsl/fo/pagesetup.xsl - Jirka Kosek

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildM: /trunk/xsl/html/Makefile - Michael(tm) Smith
Citations to nonexistent biblioentries do not issue warning.M: /trunk/xsl/html/inline.xsl - Jirka Kosek
More carefully select language substring for sorting.M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx-kimber.xsl - Robert Stayton
re-Fixed typo introduced in html/synop.xsl, and re-disabled reference.pdf build in snapshot build.M: /trunk/xsl/html/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Fixed typo introduced in previous html/synop.xsl commit.M: /trunk/xsl/html/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
xsl:sort lang attribute now uses two-char substring of lang attribute.M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx-kimber.xsl - Robert Stayton

Support titlecase "Java", "Perl", and "IDL" as values for the language attribute on classsynopsis, etc. (instead of just lowercase "java", "perl", and "idl"). Also support "c++" and "C++" (instead of just "cpp").
Affects HTML, FO, and manpages output. Closes bug 1552332. Thanks to "Brian A. Vanderburg II".M: /trunk/xsl/html/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Further tinkering with sidebar handling. Think I got it right this time. (re)closes bug 1541793. Thanks to Mauritz Jeanson.M: /trunk/xsl/html/block.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Added support for the reference.autolabel param in (X)HTML and FO output.M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith
Support rows that are *completely* overlapped by the preceding rowM: /trunk/xsl/html/table.xsl - Norman Walsh
Exclude mml result prefix unless mml is in the output.M: /trunk/xsl/html/math.xsl - Robert Stayton
Rearranged templates for the 3 indexing methods and changed method named 'english' to 'basic'.M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
New modules for supporting indexing extensions.A: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx-kimber.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx-kosek.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1542773 section title in info not working, for db5 too.M: /trunk/xsl/html/sections.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1542773 section title in info not formatting correctly.M: /trunk/xsl/html/sections.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug 1545377 xml:id not supported in glossary.xsl.M: /trunk/xsl/html/glossary.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed part of bug #1484944 authorgroup needing a named anchor.M: /trunk/xsl/html/titlepage.xsl - Robert Stayton
Added IDs in a number of places that should have time.M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith

Added several new HTML parameters for controlling appearance of content on HTML title pages:
contrib.inline.enabled: If non-zero (the default), output of the contrib element is displayed as inline content rather than as block content.
othercredit.like.author.enabled: If non-zero, output of the othercredit element on titlepages is displayed in the same style as author and editor output. If zero (the default), othercredit output is displayed using a style different than that of author and editor.
blurb.on.titlepage.enabled: If non-zero, output from authorblurb and personblurb elements is displayed on title pages. If zero (the default), output from those elements is suppressed on title pages (unless you are using a titlepage customization that causes them to be included).
editedby.enabled If non-zero (the default), a localized Edited by heading is displayed above editor names in output of the editor element.M: /trunk/xsl/html/titlepage.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith

Added normalization to object.title.markup.textonly mode, reverted copyright link template in html/chunk-common.xsl to use it, and updated a couple of places in manpages that should have already been using it instead of object.title.markup.M: /trunk/xsl/html/chunk-common.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Corrected XPath expression used for locating first legalnotice instance in a document. Closes request #1476450. Thanks to Sam Steingold.M: /trunk/xsl/html/chunk-common.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Correctly handle sidebar instances that have sidebar/info/title instead of sidebar/title. This change simply makes sidebar handling for this case identical to that of abstract. Closes bug #1541793. Thanks to Mauritz Jeanson.M: /trunk/xsl/html/block.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Further refinement to cause nested QandASet to appear in top-level TOC. Patch from Daniel Leidert. Closes patch #1509018.M: /trunk/xsl/html/qandaset.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Fixed bug #1541113 predicate bugs in next/previousM: /trunk/xsl/html/chunk-code.xsl - Robert Stayton
fixed bug #1528002 olinks not handling dbhtml dirM: /trunk/xsl/html/chunk-common.xsl - Robert Stayton
Fixed bug #1537076 where sectioninfo/keywordset was not being processed.M: /trunk/xsl/html/docbook.xsl - Robert Stayton
Add Xalan variant to test for exslt:node-set function. Xalan can use function named node-set(), but doesn't recognize it using function-available().M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
Add curly braces around ⟨ in xsl:sort lang attribute to make it an AVT.M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton

Added support to FO stylesheets for handling instances of Org where it occurs outside of *info content. In HTML stylesheets, moved handling of Org out of info.xsl and into inline.xsl. In both FO and HTML stylesheets, added support for correctly processing Affiliation and Jobtitle.M: /trunk/xsl/html/inline.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/html/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Don't output punctuation between Refname and Refpurpose if Refpurpose is empty. Also corrected handling of Refsect2/title instances, and removed some debugging stuff that was generated in manpages output to mark the ends of sections.M: /trunk/xsl/html/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added new email.delimiters.enabled param. If non-zero (the default), delimiters are generated around e-mail addresses (output of the email element). If zero, the delimiters are suppressed.M: /trunk/xsl/html/inline.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith
Fixed handling of punctuation for methodparam in methodsynopsis. Closes bug 1530558. Thanks to Evan Goer and Michael Fuchs.M: /trunk/xsl/html/synop.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Removed svn:executable property from many xml and xsl files on which it had been inadvertently (CVS legacy).M: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx-ng.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Further changes related to handling when qanda.nested.in.toc is non-zer0; deal also with answer/qandaset instances (which are valid in DocBook 5).M: /trunk/xsl/html/qandaset.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added qanda.nested.in.toc param. Default value is zero. If non-zero, instances of "nested" Qandaentry (ones that are children of Answer elements) are displayed in the TOC. Closes patch 1509018 (from Daniel Leidert). Currently on affects HTML output (no patch for FO output provided).M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.ent; M: /trunk/xsl/html/qandaset.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Made changes to correct handling of nested answer/qandaentry instances. Closes bug 1509043. Thanks to Daniel Leidert.
To avoid code duplication, part of the change involved adding a new process.qandaset named template and moving the code for output of all the question/answer table markup into that template.M: /trunk/xsl/html/qandaset.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Removed obsolete DL instances from biblio.xsl that were causing invalid XHTML output. Closes bug 1509041. Thanks to Daniel Leidert.M: /trunk/xsl/html/biblio.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Used copy-of instead of value-of with biblioentry.item.separator, so that it can contain linebreaks. Closes bug 1509021. Patch from Daniel Leidert.M: /trunk/xsl/html/biblio.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Improved handling of relative locations generated filesM: /trunk/xsl/html/html.xsl - Jirka Kosek
Fix functionsynopsis presentationM: /trunk/xsl/html/synop.xsl - Norman Walsh
fixed lang entity to remove en appendageM: /trunk/xsl/html/autoidx.xsl - Robert Stayton
fixed bug 1497436 confirm @cols is a numberM: /trunk/xsl/html/table.xsl - Robert Stayton
Initial support of syntax highlighting of programlistings.M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.ent; M: /trunk/xsl/html/param.xweb; A: /trunk/xsl/html/highlight.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/html/verbatim.xsl - Jirka Kosek
Support orgM: /trunk/xsl/html/info.xsl - Norman Walsh
Support personM: /trunk/xsl/html/inline.xsl - Norman Walsh
Support $keep.relative.image.uris also when chunkingM: /trunk/xsl/html/chunk-code.xsl - Jirka Kosek

sect2.title: Highlighting
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the highlighting code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Opps, seems that I forgot to commit changes previouslyM: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/common.xsl - Jirka Kosek

Initial support of syntax highlighting of programlistings.A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/php-hl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/common.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/delphi-hl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/myxml-hl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/m2-hl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/ini-hl.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/xslthl-config.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/highlighting/java-hl.xml - Jirka Kosek

sect2.title: HTMLHelp
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the htmlhelp code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Fixed bug #1477771 where article was missing from hhc part TOC.M: /trunk/xsl/htmlhelp/htmlhelp-common.xsl - Robert Stayton

sect2.title: Lib
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the lib code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildM: /trunk/xsl/lib/Makefile - Michael(tm) Smith
Added some IDs to the lib.xweb file.M: /trunk/xsl/lib/lib.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith
Did some touch-ups to a few files to ensure that building from PDF and text from reference.dbk will work.M: /trunk/xsl/lib/lib.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith

sect2.title: Manpages
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the manpages code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Suppress footnote markers and output warning that footnotes are not yet supported.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/docbook.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/links.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/other.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildM: /trunk/xsl/manpages/Makefile - Michael(tm) Smith

Fixed handling of verbatims (address, screen, etc.) within listitem instances in varlistentry and glossentry. (We now always use .RS instead of .TP). Closes bug 1551922 and closes Debian bug 385940. Thanks to Daniel Leidert and Jakub Wilk.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/lists.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Correctly handle lists that have block content before the actual list items. Closes bug #1547511. Thanks to Daniel Leidert. Also, attempt to be smarter about adding space after lists where needed.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/lists.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Adjusted normalization of person-names. The person.name.normalized template now checks the RTF of output from person.name template node-by-node, and does normalization only on the nodes that need it. Also fixed normalization of email output for the metadata comment part of the man page, such that normalization is done before the angle brackets are added.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/utility.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added normalization to object.title.markup.textonly mode, reverted copyright link template in html/chunk-common.xsl to use it, and updated a couple of places in manpages that should have already been using it instead of object.title.markup.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/table.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/block.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added person.name.normalized template to cause contents of author, editor, etc., names to be normalized. Also added normalization in several others places in *info output that lacked it. Thanks to Daniel Leidert.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/utility.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Properly process collabname, corpauthor, corpcredit, orgname, and publishername before normalizing.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Normalize corpauthor|corpcredit|orgname|publishernameM: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Normalize output of contrib instances.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Handle instances of address/otheraddr/ulink in author et al in the same way as email instances; that is, display them on the same linke as the author, editor, etc., name.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Don't number or link-list any Ulink instance whose string value is identical to the value of its url attribute. Just display it inline.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/links.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Improved handling of cases with sibling contrib, authorblurb, or personblurb instances.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Handle instances of authorblurb or personblurb that lack sibling *name or email content. Also, make sure space gets properly normalized in para and simpara within authorblurb or personblurb.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/block.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Output linebreak before start of .RS macro in nested lists. Closes bug #1524573. Thanks to Sam Steingold.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/lists.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Normalize space in Refsect/title output.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Don't output punctuation between Refname and Refpurpose if Refpurpose is empty. Also corrected handling of Refsect2/title instances, and removed some debugging stuff that was generated in manpages output to mark the ends of sections.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Added new email.delimiters.enabled param. If non-zero (the default), delimiters are generated around e-mail addresses (output of the email element). If zero, the delimiters are suppressed.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/param.xweb; M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/param.ent - Michael(tm) Smith
Reverted suppression of markup for refsect1 instances with empty titles.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Suppressed output of .SH markup for Refsect1 instances with empty titles.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/refentry.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

In manpages output, if the last/nearest *info element for particular Refentry has multiple Copyright and/or Legalnotice children, process them all (not just the first ones). Closes bug 1524576. Thanks to Sam Steingold for the report and to Daniel Leidert for providing a patch.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/info.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Made some minor fixes and clarifications to comments in the charmap.groff.xsl file.M: /trunk/xsl/manpages/charmap.groff.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

sect2.title: Params
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the params code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Added reference.autolabel parameter for controlling labels on reference output.A: /trunk/xsl/params/reference.autolabel.xml - Michael(tm) Smith

Added namespace declarations to document elements for all param files.M: /trunk/xsl/params/toc.line.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/title.font.family.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/component.label.includes.part.label.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/refentry.manual.profile.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/orderedlist.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/olink.pubid.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/informalexample.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/appendix.autolabel.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.show.toolbar.text.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/index.on.role.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.button.jump2.url.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/variablelist.term.separator.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/para.propagates.style.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/man.output.base.dir.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/man.links.list.heading.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/insert.link.page.number.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.button.jump2.title.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/l10n.lang.value.rfc.compliant.xml - Michael(tm) Smith
Updated to describe revised setup for importing index extensions.M: /trunk/xsl/params/index.method.xml - Robert Stayton

Added several new HTML parameters for controlling appearance of content on HTML title pages:
contrib.inline.enabled: If non-zero (the default), output of the contrib element is displayed as inline content rather than as block content.
othercredit.like.author.enabled: If non-zero, output of the othercredit element on titlepages is displayed in the same style as author and editor output. If zero (the default), othercredit output is displayed using a style different than that of author and editor.
blurb.on.titlepage.enabled: If non-zero, output from authorblurb and personblurb elements is displayed on title pages. If zero (the default), output from those elements is suppressed on title pages (unless you are using a titlepage customization that causes them to be included).
editedby.enabled If non-zero (the default), a localized Edited by heading is displayed above editor names in output of the editor element.A: /trunk/xsl/params/contrib.inline.enabled.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/params/blurb.on.titlepage.enabled.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/params/othercredit.like.author.enabled.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/params/editedby.enabled.xml - Michael(tm) Smith

Added new email.delimiters.enabled param. If non-zero (the default), delimiters are generated around e-mail addresses (output of the email element). If zero, the delimiters are suppressed.A: /trunk/xsl/params/email.delimiters.enabled.xml - Michael(tm) Smith

Removed svn:executable property from many xml and xsl files on which it had been inadvertently (CVS legacy).M: /trunk/xsl/params/article.appendix.title.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.enhanced.decompilation.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.window.geometry.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.show.toolbar.text.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/admon.textlabel.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.remember.window.position.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.display.progress.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.hhp.windows.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/textdata.default.encoding.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/index.preferred.page.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/htmlhelp.hhc.width.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/qanda.title.properties.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/params/manifest.in.base.dir.xml - Michael(tm) Smith

Added qanda.nested.in.toc param. Default value is zero. If non-zero, instances of "nested" Qandaentry (ones that are children of Answer elements) are displayed in the TOC. Closes patch 1509018 (from Daniel Leidert). Currently on affects HTML output (no patch for FO output provided).A: /trunk/xsl/params/qanda.nested.in.toc.xml - Michael(tm) Smith
Word-smithingM: /trunk/xsl/params/highlight.source.xml - Jirka Kosek
Initial support of syntax highlighting of programlistings.A: /trunk/xsl/params/highlight.source.xml; A: /trunk/xsl/params/highlight.default.language.xml - Jirka Kosek

sect2.title: Template
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the template code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Did some touch-ups to a few files to ensure that building from PDF and text from reference.dbk will work.M: /trunk/xsl/template/titlepage.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Added more IDs, and added support to docsrc/xsl2jref.xsl for copying their values to output.M: /trunk/xsl/template/titlepage.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Added IDs in a number of places that should have time.M: /trunk/xsl/template/titlepage.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

sect2.title: Tools
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the tools code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Fixed xsl-params.xsl build.M: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/make-xsl-params.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith

Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildA: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/pirefentry.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/dblatex-release-notes.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/reference.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/xsl-param-link.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/xsl2jref.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/reference-fo.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/make-xsl-params.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/jrefhtml.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/clrefentry.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/doc-link-docbook.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/make-elements.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/jref2refsect1.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/.cvsignore; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/tdg-link.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/lrefentry.xsl; A: /trunk/xsl/tools/xsl/build/reference-txt.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
Racheted down font sizes of headings in example makefile FO output.M: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.DocBook - Michael(tm) Smith
Added param and attribute set to example makefile, for getting wrapping in verbatims in FO output.M: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.DocBook - Michael(tm) Smith
Renamed Makefile.paramDoc to Makefile.docParam.A: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.docParam; D: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.paramDoc - Michael(tm) Smith
Added Makefile.paramDoc file, for creating versions of param.xsl files with doc embedded.A: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.paramDoc - Michael(tm) Smith
Added variable to example makefile for controlling whether HTML or XHTML is generated.M: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.DocBook - Michael(tm) Smith
Correctly handle cases where DocBook files have an extension other than .xmlM: /trunk/xsl/tools/make/Makefile.DocBook - Michael(tm) Smith

sect2.title: WordML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the wordml code since the 1.70.1 release.

literallayout.phrase: Moved XSL stylesheets out of docsrc dir and into tools/xsl/buildM: /trunk/xsl/wordml/Makefile - Michael(tm) Smith
Did some touch-ups to a few files to ensure that building from PDF and text from reference.dbk will work.M: /trunk/xsl/wordml/param.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith
Added IDs in a number of places that should have time.M: /trunk/xsl/wordml/param.xweb - Michael(tm) Smith

Removed svn:executable property from many xml and xsl files on which it had been inadvertently (CVS legacy).M: /trunk/xsl/wordml/docbook.xsl; M: /trunk/xsl/wordml/specifications.xml; M: /trunk/xsl/wordml/wordml.xsl - Michael(tm) Smith
